api_list.api_description: Retrieve details of a specific bike sharing network.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve NHL standings for a specific date.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which the standings are requested (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

query: Can you provide the bike sharing network details for 'velib' and also let me know what the NHL standings were on November 8, 2023?
